name: Notion Daily Journal
description: Introducing the Notion Daily Journal: Your Ultimate Starting Point to develop a journalling practice.The template comes set up with the following awesome features to get you started logging some data each day:Mood and Energy Tracking:Monitor your emotional well-being and energy levels easily with pre filled options which can be adjusted to fit whatever works for you!. Gain valuable insights into your daily fluctuations and identify patterns that affect your energy levels and happiness.Habit Trac
features: Drink 2L of water; Read a book
